content.prompt: Which of the following ethical considerations applies to this research?

choices.label: Because the study is being conducted at a shopping center, Dr. Blankenship does not need to get informed consent from the participants.
This study would not receive approval during institutional review because obedience research cannot be legally conducted.
Because there is very low risk to the participants in this study, Dr. Blankenship will not need to be concerned about confidentiality of the participantsâ€™ results.
Because the study involves deception, Dr. Blankenship must debrief the participants following the study to inform them about the true purpose of the research.
